name: Pan-Fried Mushrooms with Ricotta Cheese
author: SteilishPike
summary: Eat this dish as a side or my personal favorite is topping a grilled sirloin or peppered steak with the mushrooms and drippings. You can use whole or sliced mushrooms. Taste and add garlic powder and seasoned salt if you want more of a taste to it.
directions: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir mushrooms until they begin to sweat, about 5 minutes
Add vinegar, beef bouillon, and garlic
Cook and stir mushroom mixture until bouillon is dissolved and mushrooms are lightly browned, 10 to 15 more minutes
Stir ricotta cheese into mushroom mixture and remove from heat
